title: Why people are falling in love with AI chatbots
description: More people are forming romantic bonds with artificial intelligence, sparking debate over whether these relationships represent progress or peril.
content:
As AI-powered chatbots become more popular, AI-human relationships are a new and growing phenomenon.
People are falling in love with their chatbots. There are now dozens of apps that offer intimate companionship with an AI-powered bot, and they have ... [6010 chars]

title: AI Fuels Wall Street Surge Despite Economic Concerns
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) investments have buoyed Wall Street, driving second quarter earnings higher despite tariff concerns. With 297 S&P 500 companies reporting results, earnings growth estimates increased from 5.8% to 9.8%. Strong earnings from companies like Microsoft and Meta Platforms reassured investors about AI's future potential.
content: Amid concerns over tariffs and economic slowdown, Artificial Intelligence (AI) investments have invigorated Wall Street's performance at near record highs. This resurgence is evidenced by the latest earnings reports from 297 of the S&P 500 companies,... [669 chars]

title: Silicon Valley’s AI Spend Goes Berserk as Microsoft Starts Cashing In
description: Tech giants reported eye-watering figures linked to artificial intelligence investment.
content:
Meta, Apple, Microsoft, and Amazon all reported quarterly earnings this week, and there was a common thread tying them together: a boom in AI spending and plans to increase it even more, beyond analyst expectations.

title: House bill to criminalize sexually explicit AI deepfakes
description: MANILA, Philippines — Bagong Henerasyon Rep. Robert Nazal filed House Bill 807 which seeks to criminalize the creation and distribution of sexually explicit deepfakes that are generated through artificial intelligence (AI).
